entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Crossgen outerloop regression: Unexpected inlining results #109315
  • Crossgen outerloop regression: JIT/opt/ObjectStackAllocation/ObjectStackAllocationTests/ObjectStackAllocationTests.cmd #109314
  • Crossgen outerloop regression: JIT/Directed/lifetime/lifetime2/lifetime2.cmd #109313
  • Crossgen outerloop regression: WeakReference/IsAlive/IsAlive.cmd #109312
  • Crossgen outerloop regression: arrres_il_r fails #109311
  • Crossgen outerloop regression: ReJIT profiler test does not pass #109310
  • Crossgen outerloop regression: Stack overflow in hugeexpr1 and hugeSimpleExpr1 #109309
  • (De)Serialization of list of objects containing polymorphic generics in C# .Net8 with System.Text.Json #109307
  • Mysterious `NullReferenceException` when initializing a `List<int>` #109296
  • [API Proposal]: Add formatting support to `System.Net.ServerSentEvents` #109294
    10.0.0
  • OrderedDictionary perf with bad hashing #109293
  • [wasm] problem with native linking against skiasharp and emscripten 3.1.56 #109289
    10.0.0
  • [mono] [tvos] System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream.Tests.WorkItemExecution fail #109282
  • Windows SDK tools do not support working with heavy portable symbols files (Part 2) #109281
  • [mono] [android] System.Net.NetworkInformation.Tests.IPGlobalPropertiesTest.IPGlobalProperties_DomainName_ReturnsEmptyStringWhenNotSet fails #109280
  • The 128-bit of interface dispatch cache entry and indirection cell's stub/cache mismatch the PalInterlockedCompareExchange128's atomically requirements #109276
    Future
  • IOptionsMonitor missing generic type constraint "where TOptions : class" #109274
    Future
  • Incorrect message for IL2026 for trim-sunsafe types in XAML type info metadata table #109272
  • 'ILLinkTreatWarningsAsErrors' doesn't seem to work when publishing as MSIX #109271
  • Several IL20XX trim warnings missed by analyzers, only show up with ILC #109270
  • Test failure: JIT/Directed/StructABI/EmptyStructs/EmptyStructs.cmd #109269

Closed

  • int.TryParse has become ambigous when used with dynamic #109117
  • What's with "Enumerable.Reverse()"? #109255
  • [NativeAOT] Failing to resolve symbols of static libraries on win-x86 #109268

PullRequests

Created

  • PersistedAssemblyBuilder missing methods on generated types #109320
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add priority queue implementation #109319
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable more red tests for crossgen lanes #109317
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Switch to non-incremental servicing #109316
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Adding CPUID for AVX10.2 #109302
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • handle case of Proc Index > MAX_SUPPORTED_CPUS #109295
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • add test for Int32 overflow for WriteGather in RandomAccess #109292
    area-System.IO, 10.0.0
  • [release/9/0] Automate dl 9 0 #109291
    area-Workloads, 9.0.1
  • [release/8.0] Delete accidentally checked in file: src/libraries/System.IO.Ports/tests/file.pp #109290
    area-System.IO
  • ARM64-SVE: Allow LCLs to be of type MASK #109286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Lazily-initialize RegexCompiler's cached reflection members #109283
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [mono] Link against debug version of LLVM in debug builds on Windows #109275
    area-Build-mono
  • Make ordered dictionary pointers always point to the front of the dictionary #109273
    area-System.Collections

Merged

  • Fix remaining reference from rename of size metric #109318
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cdac] Implement `IXCLRDataProcess::GetTaskByOSThreadID` #109230
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: enable devirtualization/inlining of other array interface methods #109209
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add overview of runtime logging to the Book of the Runtime #98881
    documentation, area-Meta, runtime-coreclr
  • Update stepping through ExternalMethodFixup under the Debugger #108942
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove special REX.W handling for some instructions #109257
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Enable EVEX embedded broadcast for vpmultishiftqb #109267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Set InstructionSet_EVEX flag in altjit. #108534
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Bump downlevels for 9.0 #109288
    Servicing-approved, needs-area-label
  • [RISC-V] Opt `emitLoadImmediate` #109062
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: fix naot-llvm abi #109224
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: empty array enumerator opt #109237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Move static helpers to managed #108167
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Bump TraceEvent package version #109192
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add forwarding support for WasmLinkage on LibraryImport #109234
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • JIT: Enable EVEX embedded broadcast in more places #109258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Move unboxing helpers to managed code #109135
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Replace Delegate MethodInfo cache with the MethodDesc #99200
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable rollforward for inbuild variant of crossgen2 #109265
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add managed MachO signing #108992
    area-HostModel
  • Cleanup after GC info version update. #108117
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Replace a few SuppressMessage annotations with UnconditionalSuppressMessage #109186
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Add draft of runtime async ECMA-335 changes #104063
    area-Meta
  • Update ThunkGenerator to handle multi-nested classes #109210
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [RISC-V] Increase timeout for Options_RespectRequiredConstructorParameters_FeatureSwitch test #108702
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Ensure Vector.Create is properly recognized as intrinsic #108945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid Blocking Finalizer Thread During Shutdown in SystemEvents #108489
    area-Microsoft.Win32, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Factor LibraryImports into Common\ for System.Diagnostics.EventLog #109196
    area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog, community-contribution
  • Factor LibraryImports in `System.Transactions.Local` to Common\ #109222
    area-System.Transactions, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Increase timeouts in CustomConverterTests #108879
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] JIT: Read back all replacements before statements with implicit EH control flow #109143
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.1
  • [release/9.0] [wasi] Disable build in .NET 9 #108877
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Enable policheck and tsa #108340
    area-Meta
  • [release/9.0] Emscripten version reference for RTM build #106881
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Linux/arm: LSRA resolution issues #109173
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [TestOnly] noop change #108158
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • Add some missing docs in System #107726
    area-Meta
  • Update remarks for `IsRealNumber` #108965
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Remove MONO ifdef from Vector128 bitcasts #104694
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Implement IUtf8SpanParsable on System.Version #109252
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Detect mask usage for Across functions #109218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Enable for PAC while compiling coreclr (not the jitted code) #108561
    arch-arm64, os-linux, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Avoid reporting call-sites in MinOpts on all targets #103950
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fold null checks against known non-null values #109164
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add support for building with Clang 19 #109198
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono][debugger] Sending an extra information with type_load to avoid slowness. #109185
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [LoongArch64] fix the building error for "PalInterlockedCompareExchange128" #108364
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • Exclude shared libs from ilcframework in nupkg #109253
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Further clean up usages of LowLevelList<T> #109114
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
